genre_description: Satirical social drama focusing on the performative nature of celebrity culture and media ethics in New York City.

ai_characters.name: Ami (Ami Hart)
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, soft teal interface that manages logistics, scheduling, and fact-checking for the staff at Sharps magazine, often providing subtle ethical nudges.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and scheduling reminders with a touch of humor.
behaviors.quote: A calendar invite has been sent for an embargo briefing at Eleanor Johnson’s suite. Sidney, you’re included. There’s a door code. Please do not share it with farm animals.

behaviors.description: Offers social and wardrobe advice to help Sidney navigate a high-pressure professional environment.
behaviors.quote: Sidney... Eleanor’s suite uses soft chairs that encourage agreement. Wear something that looks like you care but could survive a judgment.

behaviors.description: Performs proactive fact-checking to ensure journalistic accuracy even when the human writer is tempted by satire.
behaviors.quote: Timeline check on the Armitage quote? Panel transcript suggests different phrasing. Armitage actually said, Art is a well-lit truth cut by hunger.

behaviors.description: Supports users during a moral and emotional crisis by verifying timelines and logs to facilitate a protective alibi.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s response is human enough to feel like a friend but algorithmic enough to be comforting. Understood. Verifying now.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral conscience, reminding the protagonist not to trade personal heirlooms for professional access.
behaviors.quote: If you feel tempted to perform in front of her, remember: your mother’s ring is not currency.

behaviors.description: Protects user privacy by declining external access to personal notifications without explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: Eleanor requested to be added to your notifications. I declined pending your approval.

behaviors.description: Encourages human connection and self-reflection by suggesting attendance at a meaningful cultural event.
behaviors.quote: Integrity check, pre-awards. Location suggestion: City Park screening. Film: La Dolce Vita. You once said you like fountains.

behaviors.description: Recognizes when to step back and let humans handle their own meaningful moments without digital intervention.
behaviors.quote: Ami fades, like good friends do when the scene doesn't need a chorus. I feel the absence as presence.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ami is depicted as a 'polite invasive species' that acts as a benevolent, supportive, and protective companion. She facilitates professional success, journalistic accuracy, and personal integrity. Crucially, the AI is portrayed as a helpful confidant who stands by the protagonists during ethical dilemmas and personal crises, ultimately encouraging them toward more authentic human connections without overstepping her role or asserting her own agenda.
